body_html: --config=cuda will compile for GPU, but that doesn't mean that all ops are necessarily run on GPU. If you have a SessionOptions object, you can set_log_device_placement(true), which will log the placement of ops, and you can check that they actually run on GPU.
body_text: --config=cuda will compile for GPU, but that doesn't mean that all ops are necessarily run on GPU. If you have a SessionOptions object, you can set_log_device_placement(true), which will log the placement of ops, and you can check that they actually run on GPU.
body: `--config=cuda` will compile for GPU, but that doesn't mean that all ops are necessarily run on GPU. If you have a `SessionOptions` object, you can `set_log_device_placement(true)`, which will log the placement of ops, and you can check that they actually run on GPU.
